name: Bugged Out
description:
Step into the boots of the town's fearless pest hunter! Face off against a swarm of creepy crawlies, from relentless roaches to voracious locusts, shrewd spiders and more. It's a cat-and-mouse game where you're the mouse and they're the... well, let's just say you'll need more than just bug spray to survive.

Dodge, spray, and strategize your way through hordes of infestations, and don't let these bugs climb up your face. Can you squash the infestation, or end up getting 'Bugged Out!

Features
1. Upgradeable bug spray weapon, including... uh, facial moisturizer and deep breathing?
2. Variety of common and strange otherworldly bug species with unique behavior.
3. Shudder at the sound of a bug's flapping wings as it flies close to your face.
5. Shake off bugs that are stuck to you using your mouse.
6. Multiple locations, from apartment to chalet, office, train station, train and... stadium? (more locations to be added)
7. This is probably more a horror than an FPS game.
8. For those with entomophobia (fear of insect), you've been warned!
